contractName: It Came From The Rim I
shortDescription: Professor Bambo, a renowned Star League historian, was conducting an independent survey on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} under an IE research survey when his expedition was ambushed by a pirate group. He has been able to re-establish contact and has asked for an extraction at a designated location. Once you rejoin Professor Bambo's expedition you are to assist him in destroying all Inheritor forces in the area.
longDescription: According to Dr. Murad, this 'Professor' has quite a reputation for unethical activities while conducting research.

contractObjectiveList.title: Rescue IE Professor And Escape
contractObjectiveList.description: Capture Convoy Rally Point, Escort Convoy to Safety, and Extract Safely

objectiveList.title: Destroy Inheritor Guards
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the force of enemies which will try and stop the player from reaching the rally point.

objectiveList.title: Destroy Inheritor Patrol
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy enemy units which will attempt to block the convoy from reaching its destination.

objectiveList.title: Escort IE Professor
objectiveList.description: Escort Friendly units to their Destination

objectiveList.title: Ensure IE Professor Survival
objectiveList.description: Protect the all units in Convoy during Extraction, suffering no losses.

objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy hunter lance for mission complete.
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy hunter lance for mission complete.

objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone
objectiveList.description: The objective to escape with all the player units.

objectiveList.title: Protect LosTech 'Mech as it Embarks on the Dropship

dialogueContent.words: From the top it looks quiet, I'm not seeing any 'Mech signatures. Shouldn't we expect any contact from this IE professor?
Our contract only specifies to meet with the expedition and hopefully they'll get ready to move.
But it also mentions destroying all pirate forces threatening IE, so let's take any hostiles down first.
Pack it in, Commander. Nothing left to do here.
Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
Yo Bambo, Captain is sayin' for you to power down his 'Mech and he'll kill you quickly. Otherwise, we'll do it the slow way.
Tell that weasel that he's too late!
Professor, cut the chatter on comms!
I'm extracting now, so you're clear to evac as well, mercenary.
The Creed knows who you are Professor. Run like the Inner Sphere dog you are.
You've reached the extraction point for the Professor Bambo. Hold there and keep him safe until we can get him out.
What in the name... a ghost 'Mech!?
But I ain't no ghost, mercenary! Ensure that I remain alive until my DropShip arrives!
Boss, that 'Mech is invisible for most sensors, although visual still works...
Quiet down, protect the Professor and let's take down those pirates first.
The Professor and the LosTech 'Mech are away and safe. He's ordering us to redeploy and rejoin him.
And you're not done yet. Proceed to evac and rejoin me, there's still unfinished business with the Inheritors elsewhere.
Commander, you're being paid to protect me. Get back here immediately!
